Banner.Description: Software Development Engineer with 3+ years of experience, specialized in web application development within the .NET and Angular ecosystem. Expert in designing, maintaining, and optimizing robust and scalable solutions. Comfortable with Agile/SCRUM methodologies and DevOps practices (CI/CD, Docker, Jenkins). Passionate about emerging technologies, particularly artificial intelligence and computer vision.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In +2 years of experience I have covered many roles: Full-Stack Developer, .NET Developer, Angular Developer, and Software Development Engineer. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing system improvements, optimizing performance, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I am working on.
I also program things for my personal use, whether for hobby or utility, including artificial intelligence projects.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Development Engineer
Description: Full-Stack .NET/Angular Developer specialized in enterprise application development
Implementation of new features, bug fixes and optimization of back-end modules (.NET 6, .NET Framework 4.8, Entity Framework Core)
Development of Web APIs and implementation of unit/integration tests (MSTest, Docker)
Redesign and migration of front-ends from Angular 5 to Angular 17, including code adaptation to new standards
Design, correction and continuous improvement of front-end interfaces from mockups
Tools & Methodologies: Azure DevOps, Agile, SCRUM, UML, Unit Testing, Docker, Jenkins, MSTest, Hangfire

Experience.Missions.Title: Full-Stack .NET/Angular Developer
Description: Implementation of new features, bug fixes and optimization of back-end modules (.NET 6, .NET Framework 4.8, Entity Framework Core)
Development of Web APIs and implementation of unit/integration tests (MSTest, Docker)
Redesign and migration of front-end from Angular 5 to Angular 17, including code adaptation to new standards
Design, correction and continuous improvement of front-end interfaces from mockups with Angular 17
Tools & Methodologies: Azure DevOps, Agile, SCRUM, UML, Unit Testing, Docker, Jenkins, MSTest, Hangfire

Experience.Missions.Title: Power Platform Developer
Description: Development from scratch of an application for managing and aggregating data from affiliated establishments
Optimization of internal processes through structured data collection
Tools & Methodologies: Power Platform (PowerApps, Power Automate), SharePoint, Agile, SCRUM

Experience.Missions.Title: Full-Stack .NET/Angular Developer
Description: Design and development of REST services with .NET 7, ensuring API compatibility and performance
Update of data access layer via Entity Framework Core and integration with SQL Server
Development of new front-end and back-end features for continuous business application evolution
Evolutionary maintenance and optimization of user interface with Angular 13, NGRX, AG-Grid
Integration of mockups into dynamic and responsive user experiences
Tools & Methodologies: Azure DevOps, Agile, Docker, Jenkins, SCRUM

Experience.Missions.Title: Full-Stack .NET/Angular Developer
Description: Participation in development and maintenance of internal web platform for BTP project management (site monitoring, resources, reports)
Optimization of REST API performance and back-end processing (.NET 6, .NET Framework 4.8) with significant response time reduction
Design and automation of asynchronous workflows via Hangfire for critical task scheduling
Development of modular back-end services in C#, with continuous code and SQL performance improvement (stored procedures)
Creation and redesign of dynamic front-end interfaces in Angular 10/AngularJS, with mockup integration, bug fixes and UX optimization
Key tools and technologies: Angular 10, AngularJS, .NET 6, .NET Framework 4.8, Entity Framework, Docker, Azure DevOps, Agile/SCRUM

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MatriQ
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Innovative web application for automating quality control of construction materials in factory settings. Based on intelligent predefined rules, it ensures product compliance while optimizing production processes. The application provides real-time monitoring systems and detailed reporting to ensure operational excellence.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Clariane
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Centralized management application for Clariane company facilities, a committed player in care, healthcare and hospitality. Developed to automate and centralize data access from each facility, control room and bed availability, track equipment status and optimize operational management. The application provides a real-time overview of all facilities.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Vas Aviation
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Application for tracking fuel supply requests for aircraft. It has an email module, real-time notifications, CSV file handling for data import, price quotes. Developed in Angular and Laravel.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GlobalJobs
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: E-learning platform developed with WordPress. Fully customized design, with plugins developed from scratch. It has a customized payment module, virtual classroom, course tracking dashboard.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MBElectronics
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: E-commerce platform for technology products. Developed with WordPress and implementing a shipping system for products. It has sales reporting through customized programming.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agrourbana
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application made from scratch with an auth module, configurable graphs, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has logic for reactive forms for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tu Super Plan
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Health plans quoter that has an advanced search engine. The plans are shown based on the user's age, monthly income, and location. It has a live chat, contact form, notification system via WhatsApp and email, auth, and internal information management through the admin role.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Proyexiot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform for water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with an auth module, configurable graphs, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers. It also has logic for reactive forms for parameter configuration.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hands Game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Extended rock-paper-scissors game. A personal project developed in Angular where you play randomly against the machine. It features the use of services, interfaces, and components.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Countries Viewer
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Interface that consumes a countries API where you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four Card Feature Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page with a minimalist design listing 4 features in 4 cards. Entry animations are used with Angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social Proof Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a design made in Figma. Angular was used for development along with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ Accordion Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Frequently asked questions accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple design of a page featuring a profile card with basic information of a person.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
Contact.Description: Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions or would like to collaborate on a project.
